name: Juice Grinder Recipe File
summary: Learn about .GRIND files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: GRIND files can be exported as .PDF, .CSV, and .XLS files by selecting File â†’ Export.
NOTE: The GRIND file extension was replaced by the .GRINDX file extension in version 1.1 of Juice Grinder.

description: Recipe file created by Juice Grinder, a program used to create and save juice recipes; contains recipe results calculated from information in the Juice Grinder .DEFT file; includes ingredients, mL or g amount, number of drops, and ingredient percentages.
